 {{Itempage |notes = {{Item Lore|Thunder Striker}}
Known informally as the emo blade, the suicide sword, the kamikaze katana, this sword procs a targeted AOE DoT which will also affect the user. Use with caution. Contrary to misconception, this sword has a normal proc rate. Its AOE DoT is applied like a rain spell without direct damage, which results in three emotes to the user when the user is hit. |itemname = Thunder Runed Great Sword |second_image= Thunder Runed Great Sword.png |lucy_img_ID = 1171 |statsblock = MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM NO DROP

It has a spectacular ratio, unbeatable tank stats, and useful lifetap proc. A warrior with this axe may forego dedicated rampage-tanking weapons for it, as well as use it for tanking dangerous proccing enemies such as [[Venril Sathir]], [[a dracoliche]] and [[Maestro of Rancor]]. |itemname = Palladius' Axe of Slaughter |lucy_img_ID = 1164 |second_image=Biddil Growth raid with GM illusion.png |second_imagetext=Not pictured: P99 Server First: Vonhammer (not shown) |statsblock = MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM NO DROP
